task_completion.description: The task is completed successfully by solving the goal.

task_progress.description: Number of correct actions taken towards task completion.

invalid_actions.description: Number of invalid actions performed during the task.

strategy_consistency.description: The consistency of strategy followed during the task.

thought_process.description: The thought process employed during the task is logical and effective.

adaptability.description: Adaptability to the changing environment and feedback.
